summary: In a popular auction that matches the sinister and colorful of a circus of phenomena, a couple adopts children in exchange for their belongings. The children there acquired, usually ... See full summary »
cast: Alejandro Parrilla|Rodrigo Lico Lorente|Orlando Mastropaolo|Rocío Rodríguez Presedo|Lidia Epstejn|Walter Cornás|Hernán Lociser|Paula Staffolani|Ezequiel Comerón|Angie Hoyos|Berta Muñiz|Vanina Ragonese|Ana Oroño|Pablo Marini|Pablo Parés|Esteban Rojas|Paulo Soria
title: El hada buena - Una fábula peronista
